data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Employee: Hello sir, will you be staying with us at the hotel?
Ned: Yes, I ____ booked a room ____ two ____.
Employee: Great. Please ____ out ____ form ____ your ____.
Ned: Are ____ sure I have ____ do ____? I filled out everything online.
data.partBlankContent:
Employee: Hello sir, will you be staying with us at the hotel?
Ned: Yes, I ha__ booked a room f__ two nig___.
Employee: Great. Please fi__ out th__ form wi__ your infor______.
Ned: Are y__ sure I have t_ do th__? I filled out everything online.
data.fullContent: Employee: Hello sir, will you be staying with us at the hotel? Ned: Yes, I have booked a room for two nights. Employee: Great. Please fill out this form with your information. Ned: Are you sure I have to do this? I filled out everything online.
data.answer: 员工:你好，先生，您是住在我们酒店吗? 内德:是的，我订了两个晚上的房间。 员工:太好了。请把你的资料填在这张表上。 奈德:你确定我必须这么做吗?我都在网上填了的。
